title.text: CIRCSIM-Tutor: An Intelligent Tutoring System Using Natural Language Dialogue*

abstractContent.text: CIRCSlM-Tutor version 2, a dialogne-based intelligent tutoring system (ITS), is nearly five years old.
It conducts a conversation with a student to help the student learn to solve a class of problems in cardio-vascular physiology dealing with the regulation of blood pressure.
It uses natural language for both input and output, and can handle a variety of syntactic constructions and lexical items, including sentence fragments and misspelled words.
